name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AWS Bedrock Agent Instruction Character Counter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a live character counter to the instruction textarea on AWS Bedrock Agent console.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and easy to use live character counter for text area in the AWS Bedrock Agent Instruction
